revision.text: '''Eggs''' are items that contain Pokémon. Eggs can be obtained in several ways: buying them from [[Shops]], [[Pokémon Day Care|breeding]] level 100 Pokémon and purchasing them at the [[Shard Trader|Shard Traders]]. Hatching an egg will boost the bred Pokémon's attack by 25% of its base attack. Where you buy / obtain an egg has zero effect on the pokemon Hatched from that egg.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
